about-description-2: I'm a Junior Designer. In this briefcase I show my Projects and Practices realized
intro_newsletters: I developed the user-interface and APIs for a newsletter subscription service allowing users to sign-up for newsletters and via their sign-ups vote on newsletter that they would like to see in the future.
intro_expert-answers: I developed the APIs for a social network and Q&A forum which allows experts to answer questions on a variety of subjects. For this project I used Django for the backend and vue.js for the frontend.
intro_netflix-banner: Clone of a banner of the paper house, made only with html, css and bootstrap
intro_trello-card: Practice simulating trello cards, such as title, edit, task, etc..
